message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.NE 

Reasoning: The paper proposes a method for estimating the stationary distribution of an ergodic Markov chain given a fixed set of transitions, without additional access to the underlying system. This problem is relevant to several subfields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI), data science (cs.DS), control systems (cs.SY), and neural networks (cs.NE). The paper also mentions applications in queueing and post-processing MCMC, which further support the relevance to these subfields.
